page.title: 12Choosing Rhymes
page.content: {DIPS When we choose someone to be"on", these are some of the rhymes we use. Boy Scout walk out,get your foot out. {Eeni,meeni, macaraca,rare,rarr, {dominaka,shicabocker,lollipopa,rom, {pom push and you are out! Ippa, dippa dation my operation, how many people at the station? {Racing car number nine, losing gallons {all the time.How many gallons did it {lose?} There's a party on the hill, can you come?Bring your own cup and saucer and a nice cream bun.Can or can't afford it?.He will be there with his knickers in the air.What colour are they? {Ibble,obble,black bobble, ibble {obble out.Turn the dirty dish cloth {inside out!. }
